comments.body: can you add a comment to make it clear that `bytesByPartitionId` is indexed by the shuffle-_read_ aka reduce side?  (at least, I think it is, if I'm reading the code right.)  Also probably worth adding a comment that this is just an estimate of the size, and can really be off by an arbitrary amount given the approximations made in `HighlyCompressedMapStatus`.
